                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 1ã€åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªè‡ªå®šä¹‰çš„Redisé…ç½®æ¨¡æ¿æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå¦‚ redis_conf.j2ï¼Œå¹¶åœ¨å…¶ä¸­ä¿®æ”¹Redisç»‘å®šåœ°å€ä»¥ä¾¦å¬æ‰€æœ‰IPåœ°å€ï¼š
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        [root@localhost redis]# vim redis_conf.j2

port {{ redis_port }}

timeout 0

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        åœ¨æ­¤ç¤ºä¾‹ä¸­ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä½¿ç”¨äº† bind {{ ansible_host }} 127.0.0.1 æ¥å‘Šè¯‰RedisæœåŠ¡åªæ¥å—æœ¬åœ°IPè¿æ¥ï¼Œå¹¶ä½¿ç”¨å˜é‡ redis_port æ¥æŒ‡å®šRedisç«¯å£ã€‚

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • 2ã€åœ¨Ansible Playbookä¸­ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨templateæ¨¡å—åŠ è½½è¯¥æ¨¡æ¿å¹¶æ¸²æŸ“å®ƒï¼Œç„¶åå°†æ¸²æŸ“åçš„é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶å¤åˆ¶åˆ°Redisé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ç›®å½•ã€‚ä»¥ä¸‹æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç¤ºä¾‹Playbookï¼š
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        [root@localhost redis]# vim redis.yml
---
- name: éƒ¨ç½²RedisæœåŠ¡
  hosts: web
  remote_user: root
  gather_facts: no
  vars:
    redis_port: 6379  # æŒ‡å®šRedisç«¯å£

  tasks:
    - name: Upload yum repo
      copy: 
        src: /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-Base.repo
        dest: /etc/yum.repos.d
        backup: no
      tags: 
       - upload_yum
       - upload_repo
       - redis_server

    - name: Upload epel repo
      copy:
        src: /etc/yum.repos.d/epel.repo
        dest: /etc/yum.repos.d/
        backup: no
      tags: 
       - upload_epel
       - upload_repo
       - redis_server

    - name: Check redis install
      shell: /usr/bin/rpm -q redis
      register: redis_msg
      ignore_errors: yes
      tags: 
       - check_redis
       - redis_server

    - name: Install redis server
      yum: 
        name: redis
        state: present
      when: redis_msg.failed == true
      tags: 
       - install_redis
       - redis_server

    - name: Upload redis.conf
      template:
        src: redis_conf.j2
        dest: /etc/redis.conf
      notify: Restart Redis
      tags: 
       - upload_redis.conf
       - redis_server

    - name: Start Redis server
      service:
        name: redis
        state: started
        enabled: yes
      tags: 
       - start_redis
       - redis_server

    - name: Restart Redis server
      service:
        name: redis
        state: restarted
      tags:
       - restart_redis
        
    - name: Stop Redis Server
      service: 
        name: redis
        state: stopped
      tags: 
        - stop_redis
        - uninstall_redis

    - name: uninstall Redis Server
      yum: 
        name: redis
        state: absent
      tags: 
        - uninstall_redis

  handlers:
    - name: Restart Redis
      service:
        name: redis
        state: restarted

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        # 2.4 ä½¿ç”¨Rolesï¼ˆéƒ¨ç½²nginxï¼‰

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        æµç¨‹ï¼š

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        å®šä¹‰é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ --> å®šä¹‰jinja2æ¨¡æ¿ï¼Œç”Ÿæˆé…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ç”¨ --> å®šä¹‰å˜é‡ --> å®šä¹‰è§¦å‘ï¼ˆé€šçŸ¥å·²å®šä¹‰åœ¨é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­ï¼‰ --> å®šä¹‰rolesçš„ymlæ–‡ä»¶

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        5æ­¥

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        æ£€æŸ¥ymlè¯­æ³• --> æ‰§è¡Œroles.ymlæ–‡ä»¶ --> æŸ¥çœ‹æœåŠ¡å¯åŠ¨çŠ¶æ€

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • å®šä¹‰é…ç½®æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š/etc/ansible/roles/nginx/tasks/main.yml
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        - name: install wget
	yum: name=wget state=present
	
- name: wget nginx package
	command: " wget http://nginx.org/packages/centos/7/x86_64/RPMS/nginx-1.18.0-1.el7.ngx.x86_64.rpm -O /etc/ansible/roles/nginx/files/nginx-1.18.0-1.el7.ngx.x86_64.rpm"
	
- name: cp nginx
  copy: src=nginx-1.18.0-1.el7.ngx.x86_64.rpm dest=/tmp/nginx-1.18.0-1.el7.ngx.x86_64.rpm
  
- name: install nginx
  yum: name=/tmp/nginx-1.18.0-1.el7.ngx.x86_64.rpm state=latest
  
- name: conf
  template: src=nginx.conf.j2 dest=/etc/nginx/nginx.conf
  tags: nginxconf
  notify: new conf to reload

- name: start service
  service: name=nginx state=started enabled=true
